capabilities.name: set_projects_base_dir
capabilities.description: Sets the base directory where your Xcode projects are stored.

capabilities.name: set_project_path
capabilities.description: Sets the active Xcode project by specifying the path to its .xcodeproj directory.

capabilities.name: get_active_project
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information about the currently active Xcode project.

capabilities.name: read_file
capabilities.description: Reads the contents of a file within the active Xcode project.

capabilities.name: write_file
capabilities.description: Writes or updates the content of a file in the active Xcode project.

capabilities.name: list_project_files
capabilities.description: Lists all files within an Xcode project.

capabilities.name: analyze_file
capabilities.description: Analyzes a source file for potential issues using Xcode's static analyzer.

capabilities.name: build_project
capabilities.description: Builds the active Xcode project using the specified configuration and scheme.

capabilities.name: run_tests
capabilities.description: Executes tests for the active Xcode project.

capabilities.name: run_xcrun
capabilities.description: Executes a specified Xcode tool via 'xcrun'.

capabilities.name: list_simulators
capabilities.description: Lists all available iOS simulators with their details by invoking 'xcrun simctl list --json'.

capabilities.name: boot_simulator
capabilities.description: Boots an iOS simulator identified by its UDID.

capabilities.name: shutdown_simulator
capabilities.description: Shuts down an active iOS simulator using its UDID.

capabilities.name: run_lldb
capabilities.description: Launches the LLDB debugger with custom arguments.

capabilities.name: trace_app
capabilities.description: Captures a performance trace of an application using 'xctrace'.

capabilities.name: swift_package_update
capabilities.description: Updates the dependencies of your Swift project using Swift Package Manager by invoking 'swift package update'.

capabilities.name: list_directory
capabilities.description: Lists the contents of a directory, showing both files and subdirectories.
